snippet: Michael Adams of Britain won the Sparkassen Chess Meeting in Germany last week in a demonstration of his career renaissance.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that win by British grandmaster Michael Adams at Sparkassen Chess Meeting in Germany demonstrates his career renaissance.
lead_paragraph: Michael Adams of Britain won the Sparkassen Chess Meeting in Germany last week in a demonstration of his career renaissance.

headline.main: At 41, a Player Regains His Edge and High Ranking
headline.print_headline: At 41, a Player Regains His Edge and High Ranking
